name: Turtle Rush
description:
Turtle Rush is a top down platformer set in a beautiful post apocalyptic Florida following the story of Oscar Green; The sole Turtle to avoid death or capture at the hands of the vile, heinous, insidious Seagull race... Though opinions tend to vary race to race.

Oscar will have to traverse a variety of traps and mazes across 10 levels ranging from small beach villages to the newly formed mountain ranges of Florida in an effort to discover the mystery of why the turtles were attacked and captured.
